descriptionModels.description:
You know with 2 cantrips and 3 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 2 1st level slots.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 2 cantrips and 4 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 3 1st level slots.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 2 cantrips and 5 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots and 2 2nd level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 2 cantrips and 6 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots and 2 2nd level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 3 cantrips and 7 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots and 3 2nd level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 3 cantrips and 8 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots and 3 2nd level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 3 cantrips and 9 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots, 3 2nd level and 2 3rd level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 3 cantrips and 12 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots, 3 2nd level, 2 3rd level and 1 4th level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

You know with 3 cantrips and 13 spells from the wizard spell list. You have 4 1st level slots, 3 2nd level, 2 3rd level and 1 4th level.

Spell save DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Spell attack mod = proficiency bonus + Intelligence mod

Over the course of 1 hour short rest, you can bond a weapon to you. Once bonded, you cannot be disarmed unless you are incapacitated and if the weapon is on the same plane of existence, you can summon it to your hand as a bonus action. You can bond up to two weapons at once
You can use your action to cast a cantrip and make one weapon attack as a bonus action
Any creature you hit with a weapon attack has disadvantage on its next save it makes against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn
You can teleport up to 30 feet to a space you can see when using your Action Surge. The teleport can take place before or after the Action Surge
You can make one weapon attack as a bonus action whenever you use your action to cast a spell.
